noticia: [Francisca, a journalist specializing in cryptocurrencies]  Binance adds new cryptocurrency and removes several trading pairs. According to Binance, the largest crypto exchange in the world, they have added a new cryptocurrency to their platform, as well as removed several trading pairs with low liquidity.  This move shows subtle changes in the market and how the exchange is adapting to them. Recently, Binance also launched a book...  Source: [Binance adds new cryptocurrency and removes several trading pairs](https://livecoins.com.br/binance-adiciona-nova-criptomoeda-e-remove-de-diversos-pares-de-negociacao/)  Bitcoin price: $23,500 Ethereum price: $1,650 XRP price: $0.50 BNB price: $220  Note: The prices are in US dollars and based on the latest available data.  [End of script]
